name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: A simple and classic pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomato sauce, and basil leaves.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough and spread tomato sauce evenly.
Top with slices of fresh mozzarella and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.
Slice and serve hot.
cookingNote: Use fresh mozzarella for a creamy texture and authentic flavor. Adjust the bake time for a crispier crust.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A crowd favorite with a perfect balance of spicy pepperoni and melted cheese.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Spread tomato sauce over the pizza dough.
Top with mozzarella cheese and pepperoni slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
Slice and serve.
cookingNote: For a spicier kick, add chili flakes on top before baking.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: A tangy BBQ sauce base topped with grilled chicken, red onions, and mozzarella cheese.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Spread BBQ sauce over the pizza dough.
Top with shredded chicken, red onions, and mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.
cookingNote: For extra flavor, drizzle more BBQ sauce on top just before serving.

name: Veggie Supreme Pizza
description: A vegetarian pizza loaded with bell peppers, onions, olives, and mushrooms.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Spread tomato sauce over the pizza dough.
Top with mozzarella cheese, bell peppers, onions, olives, and mushrooms.
Sprinkle with oregano and bake for 12-15 minutes.
Slice and serve.
cookingNote: Feel free to add extra vegetables like spinach or zucchini for more flavor.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
description: A sweet and savory pizza topped with ham, pineapple, and mozzarella cheese.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Spread tomato sauce over the pizza dough.
Top with mozzarella cheese, ham, and pineapple.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake for 12-15 minutes.
Slice and serve.
cookingNote: You can substitute pineapple with other fruits like mango for a tropical twist.
